amendment.description: To reform the regulatory process to ensure that small businesses are free to compete and to create jobs, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 390, under the order of 6/9/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 87.

action.text: Amendment SA 390 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S3594, S3603-3604) To reform the regulatory process to ensure that small businesses are free to compete and to create jobs, and for other purposes.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 390, under the order of 6/9/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 87.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 390, under the order of 6/9/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, the amendment was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 87.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 390 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Snowe.
